function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher and more variable population during the pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to larger and more unpredictable population movements","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, increase testing and contact tracing, and promote vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and testing technologies, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and essential workers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, and employers"},{"Description":"Increase in unemployment rate during the pandemic","Impact":"High unemployment may lead to economic hardship, stress, and reduced access to healthcare, increasing susceptibility to infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Provide financial assistance, job retraining programs, and mental health support. Ensure access to healthcare services for unemployed individuals","Technologies":"Online job portals, virtual career fairs, and telehealth services","People":"Unemployed individuals and their families","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations, and employers"},{"Description":"Rise in teleworking during the pandemic","Impact":"Increased reliance on remote work may lead to social isolation, sedentary lifestyle, and mental health issues, impacting overall well-being and immune system function","Mitigation":"Encourage social connections, provide mental health resources, and promote physical activity and healthy living habits for remote workers","Technologies":"Teleconferencing tools, wellness apps, and virtual team-building platforms","People":"Remote workers and their families","Owner":"Employers, mental health organizations, and fitness professionals"}]}
